1509077-a.title: Broadway - 18th Street, southwest corner
1509077-a.folder: Broadway - 18th Street, southwest corner, Manhattan, NY

717326f-b.text:
(1)
Broadway, west side, north from and including East 18th Street to Madison Square, showing the retail dry goods area of this date. Arnold, Constable and Company and Lord and Taylor are occupying the S.W. corners of East 19th and 20th Streets respectively. These, including Thomas Lotan (fruit store) appear in Gouldings Business Directory of New York, 1875.
About 1875.
Gift of H.D. Jewett.
(2)
Broadway,the same,showing W.P.A. reconstruction work.
August 10th, 1937
W.P.A. Photography.
